thread.title: Calipari talks through ‘Cal you suck!’ chants
thread.title_full: Calipari talks through ‘Cal you suck!’ chants

author: USA TODAY
title: Calipari talks through ‘Cal you suck!’ chants
text:
Calipari talks through ‘Cal you suck!’ chants Cal was asked about the student section, and that's when the interview ended. Post to Facebook Calipari talks through ‘Cal you suck!’ chants Cal was asked about the student section, and that's when the interview ended.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/mizzou-student-section-john-calipari-cal-you-suck-chant-kentucky-missouri-basketball-half-interview-video/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Calipari talks through ‘Cal you suck!’ chants Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 10:56   
Kentucky Wildcats head coach John Calipari reacts during the game against the LSU Tigers in the second half at Rupp Arena. Kentucky defeated LSU 92-85. (Photo: Mark Zerof-USA TODAY Sports) 
The Mizzou student section was fired up during halftime of the Kentucky vs. Missouri game as the Wildcats held just a one-point 31-30 lead, and they could be heard loud and clear while Kentucky coach John Calipari was interviewed on the court. Best halftime interview of the season pic.twitter.com/KXuwMkU3TS — Mike Rutherford (@CardChronicle) February 22, 2017 
The students shouted "Cal you suck! Cal you suck! Cal you suck!" as Calipari talked about how awful his team was playing. 
But then, after the coach was asked about the student section, he walked away and cut the interview short. That's how you know he was definitely annoyed … slash he did not want to say anything bad that might get him in trouble. 
Deep breaths, just walk away. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/mizzou-student-section-john-calipari-cal-you-suck-chant-kentucky-missouri-basketball-half-interview-video/ Most Popular
